author: IBM Technology
description:
Download the guide to learn more → https://ibm.biz/Bdaw7g
Learn more about AI solutions → https://ibm.biz/Bdaw7h

As the sales landscape continues to evolve, generative AI is bringing about a new era of innovation and efficiency. Join Brianne Zavala as she delves into the top 5 examples of how generative AI is transforming the industry. From automating routine tasks to crafting compelling stories, from sales engineers to RFP generation, Brianne covers it all. But be prepared: the future of sales is not without its challenges, and it's not for the status quo. 

AI news moves fast. Sign up for a monthly newsletter for AI updates from IBM → https://ibm.biz/Bdaw7V

#ai #generativeai #aiinsales
title: 5 Examples of Generative AI's Impact In Sales
